CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 27, 1945, pg. 3 reads: "Terpsichorean - Gwendolyn Hamilton, popular junior dance artist, will be among the many talented pupils of Mrs. Royal Hamilton who will appear in Negro Talent Night at Schenley High School Auditorium, Thursday, Oct. 25. This will mark her 26th public appearance on the stage. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Gwendolyn Hamilton wearing dance costume with headdress, halter top, and harem pants, posed with folded arms, Harris studio
